name: Boiled Rice
keywords: chicken broth, rice, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, side dish
recipeIngredient: 3 cups remaining chicken broth (if not enough, add water)

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the chicken broth to a boil and add the rice. Return to a boil and stir. Simmer for 17 minutes over low flame, covered. Add the lemon juice, blend well and serve with the chicken.
